publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2987# Pauline McNeill: International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002-That the Parliament supports International Workers' Memorial Day on 28 April 2002, a date important to trade unionists the world over; notes that, every year, over 1.3 million workers across the world die from accidents and diseases at work, nearly twice the number of deaths caused by war; further notes that many such deaths could be prevented by better health and safety management; welcomes the theme of occupational health in this year's activities, and believes that Members should actively support this important day by wearing the purple ribbon.
S1M-2987# International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-2987# International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Ms Margo MacDonald*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Christine Grahame*

S1M-2987# Pauline McNeill: International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002-That the Parliament supports International Workers' Memorial Day on 28 April 2002, a date important to trade unionists the world over; notes that, every year, over 1.3 million workers across the world die from accidents and diseases at work, nearly twice the number of deaths caused by war; further notes that many such deaths could be prevented by better health and safety management; welcomes the theme of occupational health in this year's activities, and believes that Members should actively support this important day by wearing the purple ribbon. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Michael Matheson, Ms Margo MacDonald, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Christine Grahame, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2987# International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Brian Adam*, Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2987# International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2987# International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2987# International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2987# International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-2987# International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Janis Hughes*
S1M-2987# International Workers' Memorial Day 28 April 2002 (lodged on 16 April 2002) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
